prompt_base: cinematic portrait of a muscular asian man, sharp arrogant smirk, single green Potara earring, messy jet-black hair, dark grey tunic, black long sleeves, realistic skin texture
feature_prompt: RAW photo, 8k dslr, high detailed skin, cinematic lighting, dslr, soft bokeh, detailed fabric weave on tunic, subtle shadows emphasizing evil expression, hyper-realistic hair strands
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, illustration, plastic texture, soft expression, flat lighting, low quality, friendly face
